details.sbatch: A batch system for submitting and managing jobs on a cluster.
details.snakemake: A workflow management system that can use sbatch for job submission.

resource_requirements.partition: Partition on the cluster where the job should run
resource_requirements.account: Account to charge for the job
resource_requirements.ntasks: Number of tasks for the job

details.dependencies: Dependencies between jobs specified as a list of job IDs
